Title: Breed more pigs, collect more fertilizer, produce more, practice more thrift, put away more savings, construct more
Publisher: Shaanxi Provincial Branch of the People’s Bank of China (中国人民银行陕西省分行)
Notes: An undated poster from the Great Leap Forward, published by the Shaanxi Provincial Branch of the People’s Bank of China (中国人民银行陕西省分行), printed on tired, old paper. Using papercut-like images, it urges the people to breed more pigs, collect more fertilizer, produce more, practice more thrift, put away more savings, construct more, all to help speed up reaching the Great Leap goals.
